title: Chinese envoy on Afghan Affairs calls on Foreign Secretary Amna Baloch
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 18 (APP): The Chinese Special Envoy on Afghan Affairs, Ambassador Yue Xiaoyong Monday called on Foreign Secretary Amna Baloch and discussed matters relating to mutual interests.
He also held detailed consultations with Additional Foreign Secretary (Afghanistan and West Asia), Ambassador Ahmad Naseem Warraich, according to a press release issued by the Foreign Office Spokesperson.
In the meeting, the two sides exchanged views on relations with Afghanistan. They reaffirmed the vital role of neighbouring countries for a peaceful and stable Afghanistan.
